content: प्रयत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Restrained, selfsubdued, holy, pious, devout, purified by austerities or religious observances; keeping the organs of sense under restraint; <ls>R. 1. 95</ls>; <ls n="R.">8. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 70</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 58</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">3. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Zealous, intent. {@--3@} Submissive. {@--4@} Careful, prudent. --तः A holy or pious person.
